text: Rishon LeZion, Hebrew: רִאשׁוֹן לְצִיּוֹן - "first of Zion", is a city in Israel. About 244,000 people were living here in 2015. Rishon LeZion is in the Gush Dan region in the Central District, south of Tel Aviv. It was founded by Russian Jews in 1882. == Other websites == *
title: Rishon LeZion
